FULL SERVICE HARDWOOD FLOOR & STAIR REFINISHING

Serving the Chicago Area, Northwest Suburbs & North Shore

Professional Hardwood Floor & Stair Refinishing Services. For over 10 years, Brian Sexton has been making dream home projects come true for his clients by providing expert workmanship, quality materials, and personalized service.
